scripts.dev: npm run dev:build && npm run dev:serve & npm run dev:watch_esbuild & npm run dev:watch_tailwind
scripts.dev:build: rm -rf dev && mkdir dev && ln ./src/index.html ./dev/index.html && ln ./src/sectalk.png ./dev/sectalk.png && npx esbuild ./src/app.tsx --bundle --target=es6 --outfile=./dev/index.js --minify && npx tailwindcss -i ./src/input.css -o ./dev/index.css --minify
scripts.build: ./inc_build_num && rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && npm run dev:build && npx html-inline-external --src dev/index.html --minify >> dist/index.html
